text:
FWIW, I saw this error last week on a machine that was upgraded to Windows 11
(Enterprise) from Windows 10 (non-managed). I ignored it and made a NTS to check
things on patch day. lol

metadata.topic: issues with Windows 11 KB5034204 - rolls back immediately on boot
metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] issues with Windows 11 KB5034204 - rolls back immediately on boot
